entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:18 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 5:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

Humidity: 50 %

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
